summary: Tested SelectItem fix for All Contacts page. The bug where page crashed with 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string' has been fixed. All filter dropdowns and edit modal dropdowns work correctly with '_none' and '_all' placeholder values.
passed_tests: All Contacts page loads without crash (9954 contacts displayed)
No SelectItem value prop errors in console
Filter dropdowns - Stage dropdown opens without crash
Filter dropdowns - Buyer Persona dropdown opens without crash
Filter dropdowns - Role dropdown opens without crash
Edit Contact modal opens without crash
Salutation dropdown in modal shows '(None)' option and works correctly
Buyer Persona dropdown in modal shows 'None' option and works correctly
Stage dropdown in modal works correctly
Save Changes button works - contact saved successfully with toast 'Contact updated'
Placeholder values (_none, _all) correctly converted back to empty strings on save
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: Console warning 'Each child in a list should have a unique key prop' in AllContacts.jsx - not critical but should be fixed for cleaner console
context_for_next_testing_agent: SelectItem fix verified working. The fix replaced value='' with value='_none' or value='_all' for all SelectItem components. Empty selection states now use '_none' placeholder value that gets converted back to '' on save. Filter dropdowns use '_all' for 'All X' options. All Contacts page at /foundations/who/all-contacts is fully functional.

bug_fix_verification.original_error: A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string
bug_fix_verification.fix_applied: Changed value='' to value='_none' or value='_all' for all SelectItem components
fix_locations: Line 42-43: SALUTATION_OPTIONS array now includes '_none' as first option
Lines 369-408: Filter dropdowns use '_all' for 'All stages', 'All personas', 'All roles'
Lines 598-610: Salutation select in modal uses '_none' for empty selection
Lines 759-772: Buyer Persona select uses '_none' for 'None' option
Lines 776-788: Stage select works correctly (no empty values needed)
